Set.Text: Increases the [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_GOLD] Gold of a city. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food from all Mountain tiles worked by this City. Only the Incans may build it.

Language_en_US.Update:
TXT_KEY_BUILDING_3QURIKANCHA
The Ushnu is an Incan unique building that increases the [ICON_PEACE] Faith of a city. Unlike the Temple it replaces, it also yields 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and has no maintenance cost. Mountains worked by this City will produce [ICON_FOOD] Food.
